lead_paragraph: TracFone Wireless, the largest prepaid mobile provider in the United States, had agreed to pay $40 million to settle agency charges that it deceived consumers.
snippet: TracFone Wireless, the largest prepaid mobile provider in the United States, had agreed to pay $40 million to settle agency charges that it deceived consumers.

headline.main: Regulators Crack Down on Marketers of ‘Unlimited’ Data Plans
headline.print_headline: Tracfone Settles With F.T.C. Over ‘unlimited’ Data Plans
